title: LEAVER BUSTER MAXIMUM BAN TIME FOR THE 5 GAME LOW PRIORITY QUEUE SHOULD BE 10 MIN!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I am a dedicated league player and have been since i began playing this game. I have as many computer problems as the next guy and these problems have caused me a slow gradual increase in my low priority queue time. I understand DCing is a problem and AFKs are a problem but over 10 min queue time is ridiculous the game are long enough. Please as a consumer of this product and a lover of league of legends let me enjoy this game without being pissed off all the time at it. (50% of the time my client messes up)

replies.body:
Its a message from Riot:

"You are ruining the gaming experience of others. Please find a better computer to play on. Regards, Riot"

> I have as many computer problems as the next guy and these problems have caused me a slow gradual increase in my low priority queue time.

That sentence is a contradiction of itself. The average person would not have so many computer problems that they would end up being hit with leavebuster repeatedly, which is how the system is intended to work, yet the fact you have so many computer issues just goes to show that you have **more** computer issues than the average person. In fact, it explicitly states in both the TOU and EULA that the **PLAYER** (not Riot) is **SOLELY** responsible for maintaining a suitable computer (in terms of connection, software and hardware) to play the game, something you have clearly failed to do since you've been repeatedly hit with LPQ. Basically, it's your own dam fault.

> over 10 min queue time is ridiculous

I think you're missing the part where this is a ***PUNISHMENT***. It's intended to be unpleasant. Personally, and I think there are plenty of people who would agree, I think it shouldn't stop at 20 minutes but rather reach up to an hour. It already has the 5 minute - 10 minute - 20 minute, just need to add in, for example, 30 minute - 45 minute - 1 hour. Piss people off even more so that they learn to sort out their sh!t or leave the game and stop ruining the experience for other people.

Maybe not 1 hour long because as your waiting a big screen pops up and you can't do anything. (and everyone in your pre game group suffers) <== This bit here is where i think should change. It should be placed in the top left or right corner so you can still talk to your team or in a chat box or to other friends.
No I'm not saying remove these punishments I'm just saying don't make it impossible to do nothing for 10-20 minutes

I'm just going to quote you something I've already said:

> I think you're missing the part where this is a ***PUNISHMENT***.

The real question is, should there be a maximum?
I'd say it should reach a point where it's very hard to increase, but why a maximum. You keep going, you keep worsening.

I don't think 20 minutes is long enough tbh, yes I do get these bans and yes they do piss me off but if my games crashes because my internet is shit I deserve a ban time for ruining the fun for all the other summoners on the rift.
